title: How to disable cookies for a specific cific website?
content: I want to disable cookies for certain website. For example allowing cookies from google and disabling cookies from quora. I don't want to disable cookies from all websites.
creator: harievm

title: Add support for TransformStream
content: According to https://support.google.com/meet/thread/75225531/when-will-the-background-blur-feature-be-released-for-firefox?hl=en google meet doesn't support virtual backgrounds or blur backgrounds on firefox because TransformStream doesn't exist on firefox. Is there a better place for me to suggest adding support for TransformStream?
creator: bur0043

title: loading icon keeps showing until I move the cursor at startup of firefox
content:
Hello,

I keep seeing a loading cursor at each startup of firefox until I move the cursor the loading icon will not disappear. When I loaded the firefox in extensions disabled mode(troubleshoot mode) the problem is fixed. But in normal mode even after disabling all my extensions and even resetting the firefox the problem won't be fixed. OS: Win 10, FF: 89.0 (stable).

Thanks

title: Combining Header Bars
content: How do I combine the Tabs menu bar with the Address bar?
creator: jadedalex

title: Google Search Displays Mobile
content: When I search on Google my search looks like it is in mobile view, this happens randomly but happens often. I restored Firefox and I still get this issue. I attached "mobile" version of Google Search, normal search, and extensions.
creator: Dark5Knight

title: media keys only working for Firefox
content: when I noticed this issue I was playing a game called minecraft when I noticed that the media keys were acting up so i tried other games and they would not work. The media keys seem to only be working for Firefox and on the very rare case google chrome I did not change anything in the settings. If anyone had a problem like this please comment below on how you fixed it thanks. ps i am using the windows 10 OS with the Firefox version being 89.0 64 bit.
creator: stevehello166

title: firefox opens in very tiny pages
content: All of a suddenly my webpages are about 2" square. I can force them to zoom, or stretch them but I'd really like to skip these steps and have things back the way they were before the latest update. I've tried several suggestions to no avail. Once fully opened, the rest all open fine. Anyone? TIA Alexa
creator: alexaconway

title: Containers Tabs Sometimes Don't Load
content: As the title suggests, sometimes when I launch a site marked for a container, it will open a new tab and show the URL but not load the page. Refreshing doesn't fix it, and I have to copy/paste the URL into a new container tab. This only happens when opening from a shortcut, not from history search or typing the URL. It seems to be happening across all containers I have. I'm using Windows 10 and the latest Firefox. Any help appreciated!
creator: tomas.acton1

title: Bookmark Folders Are Empty, Bookmarks Are All Below The Folders
content: This evening, while browsing bookmarks, all of my bookmark folders slowly emptied, from the top down, and all the bookmarks are now below the folders in no particular order. What caused this???? How do I get the original bookmark folders with bookmarks in them? I tried to restore from the most recent bookmark backup, and initially the bookmarks were in their folders, but slowly they all left the folders and showed up at the bottom of the bookmarks listing. I have a LOT of bookmarks, and want them back in their folders. Help!!!
creator: gtadamsesq

title: Tab appearance on latest version of firefox is difficult to see
content: I just upgraded firefox on 6/7/21 and the tabs in the bar across the top of the widow have a grey background with no outline and are very difficult to read. Is there a way to get the previous appearance back?
creator: rschrier

title: unusual behavior after update
content: After this update to 89, page I'm on magnifies to 500% without warning. This keeps happening and I don't know what I'm doing to make it happen. Very frustrating when you're playing online bridge and suddenly, you can't see the cards. How do I fix this? ( yes, I can go to view and revert to normal. But why do I have to do this at all?)
creator: oswartz

title: Firefox changed my View settings with the recent update ... How do I change it back?
content:
Firefox changed my View settings with the recent update ...

The new changes don't make sense at all ... They basically reduced the contrast and/or increased the brightness in the toolbar. Like other humans, I rely on contrast to see where one thing ends and another thing starts.

I didn't ask for or agree to this ... How do I change it back? (I clicked around and it's not obvious.)
creator: bhargin

title: Web Search
content: My question is: When you open a new tab in your browser there is something call web search. Is it possible that everything that I input in there can be shown in that little box below the Firefox logo. Instead of getting display on top of the website box.
creator: aurauwu25

title: Two rows of tabs with search bar in-between them
content: What happened to my interface? I have three rows at the top of my screen: TABS then SEARCH BAR with icons like always, then another row of tabs with my favorites. I cannot get rid of that top row! If I close them tab by tab, then once I delete the remaining? The whole thing closes! I am so angry. WHAT IS WRONG?
creator: MaureenJordan

title: curser goes to addres bar when typing on google search box
content: when I type on the search, it automatically shows up in my address bar instead of the Google search box on Firefox 89.0. Does anyone know how to fix this problem? I've noticed others may have had this problem but haven't seen any solutions given. I wanted to ask someone at firefox but this is the only way apparently.

title: Home Screen
content: Home screen changed about an hour ago. I don't know what to do. I've refreshed, uninstalled and reinstalled. my preference screen is different. My background is gray it was black. All of my home screen items are missing. How do I restore to previous? Thank you. I'd take a screenshot but that is missing from the toolbar. So is "options" in the settings bar. I'm panicking.
creator: kimmer2dad

title: Theme did not revert to 'System' theme when it says it is 'enabled'
content: I was offered an option to try a new 'theme' when Firefox recently updated. I tried the 'Light' theme, immediately realized I don't like it, and followed the directions to revert to the original 'system' theme. That theme says it is enabled for my account, but I am stuck with the light theme on my desktop computer. I've refreshed Firefox, quit and restarted Firefox, and still am stuck with this theme that I don't want. Help?
creator: carrieoleary

title: Can't sign into addons.mozilla.org without enabling 2FA
content: Signing into addons.mozilla.org always prompts me to enable 2FA, and there is no way to progress without doing so. I am already signed into my Firefox account on the browser itself, and I have disabled 2FA in my account settings. Signing into support.mozilla.org did not prompt me to enable 2FA.
creator: garbagio

title: Sitzungswiederherstellung funktioniert nach Update auf version 89 nicht mehr!!!!!
content:
Die Sitzungswiederherstellung funktioniert bei mir nach dem Update nicht mehr! Der Browser öffnet sich und lädt zuest meine Startseite, kurz darauf versucht er wohl die Seite für die Sitzungswiederherstellung zu laden, aber raus kommt dabei nur "Neuer Tab"...

Leute, solche Sachen müssen getestet sein, bevor man Updates rausschickt!

Und falls das mal irgendjemand liest: Ändert auch bitte wieder die Tabansicht!!!!
creator: RSTMP
